author: Michael Hibdon
title: Hotel Teatro, a Denver Hotel, Announces Special Offers and Packages for Fall Visitors
text:
Hotel Teatro is preparing to welcome the guests who will enjoy a fall stay at their Denver Hotel. Fall is a popular time of year to visit the City, and Hotel Teatro is pleased to announce their impressive special offers and packages. Some of the new packages are described below. The entire list of current offers can be viewed on the Hotel’s website. View offer details > Reel It In Fly Fishing Package
The Denver Hotel gives guests a chance to enjoy this popular Colorado Activity. This package includes:
Transportation to and from Hotel Teatro to Lincoln Hills Fly Fishing Club All gear needed to enjoy a day of fly fishing Private instructor Lunch prepared by a private chef at Lincoln Hill
Romance Package
Denver is a romantic City, and Hotel Teatro helps guests enjoy their getaway with this special offer. The Romance Package includes:
A bottle of champagne and chocolate boudino with strawberries delivered to the room. Keepsake champagne glasses $40 breakfast credit that can be used in The Study or for in-room dining
“Wine Not” Package
Many wineries are located near this Denver Hotel, and this package gives guests a chance to explore one of them. The “Wine Not” package includes:
Transportation to and from Hotel Teatro to the Infinite Monkey Theorem Urban Winery Tour of the winery Bottle of 100th Monkey Wine $40 breakfast credit that can be used in The Study or for in-room dining 3-bottle Monkey Theorem Wine membership
Bike & Brew Package
More than 200 craft breweries are located near Hotel Teatro. The Bike & Brew Package has been a favorite of visitors since it was first introduced. This package includes:
Beer lovers welcome including 2 drafts of local craft beer, a cheese and charcuterie board, and a keepsake beer glass A map of local breweries that includes insider tips and what to drink at each spot Use of one of the Denver Hotel’s cool vintage bikes to use as you tour the craft breweries $40 breakfast credit that can be used in The Study or for in-room dining
Other special offers at Hotel Teatro include the Denver Shopping Package, Bed & Breakfast Package, The Nickel Dinner Package, and Denver Hotel Parking Package. Special rates are available for members of AAA and those who book their stay at least 21 days in advance.
Hotel Teatro’s luxury Guest Rooms and Suites make this Denver Hotel a favorite with both business and leisure travelers.
About Hotel Teatro - A Denver Hotel:
Located in Downtown Denver, Hotel Teatro - A Denver Hotel is located across from the Denver Center for Performing Arts. The luxury, Four-Diamond Boutique Denver Hotel features 109 exquisite guest rooms and suites. The Denver Hotel’s meticulously-restored historic façade and newly renovated lobby has been distinguished as one of the “Top Hotels in the World” by Expedia and one of the “World’s Best 50 City Hotels in the US” by Travel + Leisure.
With its moniker derived from the Italian word for Theater, Hotel Teatro delivers a thoughtfully-curated collection of experiences, 24-hour Room Service and exemplary guest amenities including pet pampering and wellness programming.
